actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide payment for chiropractors' services under the program of supplementary medical insurance benefits for the aged.

summary.text: Permits payments, under title XVIII of the Social Security Act (Medicare), for licensed chiropractor's services under the program of supplementary medical insurance benefits for the aged.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide payment for chiropractors' services under the program of supplementary medical insurance benefits for the aged.
